I reach the crowd shortly afterwards. Of course, I could just trample them under my body, but that would be too standard. Part of them fun in being me is to be creative.

I need a drink, so I just flick a hydrant with two fingers and then proceed to drink from the geyser that comes out of it. When my thirst is quenched, I just use my fingers to redirect the high pressure water stream, hitting the crowd hard as if I were some sort of riot cop. Their fragility to things that are so harmless to me never ceases to amaze me, no matter how used to it I am already.

I'm feeling playful, so I just set two fingers on the ground and start walking them towards the crowd. Their sight alone is able to scare them, each of my fingers easily towering several times over them.

I reach the crowd soon enough and just push my way into it. Once I'm in the middle of it, I start "kicking people around". Their screams intensify and then someone does something utterly stupid and shoots my fingers. Of course, it has no effect. My finger's retribution is considerably more effective as I pin him to the ground and cut him in half under my auburn fingernail.

The screams get louder and people start running around in a wilder way. I get bored and just slam my fist on them. Then I slam it again in a different section for good measure.

I then advance deeper into the crowd, not minding that my palms and knees are creating a little massacre as I do. My attention is focused somewhere else. I cannot prevent a few chuckles when I see that my long blonde locks are long enough to reach the road and are wrecking havoc on their own. Feeling playful, I move my head, sending them flying around and making a few of the tinies airborne as I do.

"YOU GUYS CANNOT EVEN FIGHT MY HAIR" I say, really amused at the results of what happened.

My stomach then groans and the yells from the ground tell me that the crowd already knows what's coming. Time usually flies when I'm having fun.

Reaching out, I pick a tiny woman with two fingers and bring her in front of my eyes. Smiling and using a soothing voice, I ask:

"WHAT TIME IS IT?"

The woman needs a full minute to tell me it's well past 1pm. Time really, really flies.

The woman has been helpful so I just set her to my side and focus on my meal. Reaching to the side of the avenue, I pick an 18-wheeler which is about as big as my hand. I rip the tractor off and then the axles with the wheels with delicacy. Once I'm done, I rip the roof and the back door. Happy with the result, I pick it from the front and push the resulting half-opened cabin into the thick crowd.

My idea works and a couple dozen people get trapped into the cargo area, scooped as if I had used a spoon. They go directly to my waiting mouth.

One of the lessons my parents made sure to teach me when I was little was not to play with the food, so I don't. I release my morsels, chew and swallow, and then I'm ready for another spoonful. I know I could do anything I pleased, like with everything else, but my parent's teaching stick, at least for this one.

This has not prevented me from torturing and killing more than a few people in my mouth, but that's when I'm not having meals.

The crowd was thick enough to satiate me. I may even have eaten a little too much. I should not have. Tonight I am having dinner with my parents. I always get a little sleepy after lunch, so I stand up and look for a suitable spot for a nap. A ballpark looks appealing enough to me, so I trample some of the survivors of my lunch and move towards it, not caring to look at my feet a single time.

I reach my destination and easily step into it through the spot where the stalls get shorter. It's not the first time I've used one of these, so I know what comes next.

I get to the opposite side of the pitch in three steps, sit down and rest my back and head into the northern stalls. When I'm sure that I'm comfortable enough I address an invisible audience.

"I KNOW YOU'RE THERE. I COULD BRING THIS BALLPARK DOWN, BUT I'M NOT INTERESTED ON IT. I WILL LEAVE YOU ALONE. ALL YOU NEED TO DO IS TUNE THE NEWS INTO THE JUMBOTRON. I WANT FOX NEWS. YOU HAVE FIVE MINUTES"

Less than three minutes later the red face of Chuck McCormick shows up on the large screen. I love listening to him. He is so upset about me!

Today spoilt brat has decided to visit Bandberg. As usual, she stepped on countless people and ate several others. Today she has also been reported to sink two large cruise ships, destroy Bandberg's bay bridge and to bring down an office building

He has been referring to me as "spoilt brat" for a while now. It's not that I like it, but seeing how red his face gets and how his eyes are about to pop from their sockets when he says it is quite amusing.

So, do you know what the government is doing about it? Nothing!

Dude, they already tried.

The mightiest country in the world and we are humiliated by an 18-year-old bitch

Yep! That sounds about right.

Where the hell are the nukes?

Whoa! He is asking the government to nuke me? Tim already said that it would not have any more effect than anything they had tried so far but if they did it would be like... gross!

Out of all the good American girls in the country, this had to happen to Amanda Stones, a person that does not represent any of our values

Well, back when I was 5'10", blonde and with a killer body and won one beauty pageant after the other I was kind of tired of hearing about how I was the perfect American girl. It's curious what a few hundred feet can do to your reputation!

She's a girl that walks her naked body around the country, who has sex in public, who doesn't have any respect for the symbols of our nation

I guess he is referring to that time I used that statue to...um... well, you get the idea. I guess I'm not conservative enough for him. I can hardly blame him for thinking that. I just hope that he does not learn that my dad actually belonged to a socialist organization back in College!

Our commander in chief should take care about her now! If he cannot, he should resign and let someone with the balls to do what needs to be done take his place

Poor guy! The President is really having a hard time because of me.

They cut for some commercials and I realize that I'm feeling sleepier. I've had enough of my daily dose of McCormick's hate. I love watching him. The way he gets upset about me is really funny.

"YOU CAN SWITCH THIS OFF NOW" I say to whoever it was that was operating the jumbotron.

Scooting forward I lie down and wait to doze off. As I do, I have a naughty idea.

1221212.content:
As I watched the liner collide with the tanker followed by a massive explosion, I shrugged, well what do you expect, fuel, friction, heat, explosion, duhhhh! I smiled at the imaginary dullness of the tinies looking surprised at this. Well, if they didn't know already they know now there is a giantess in town, or near it at least, and I bet they are all scared shitless. I'm used to seeing panicking people, it gives me such a buzz, multitudes panicking because of me, a regular girl, albeit large and naked, the number of times I've caught myself with my fingers between my legs.. And when people are scared shitless it makes them do all sorts of stupid stuff, so a lot easier to squish them.

Now, the city awaits, I suppose I can't keep them waiting, and watching me as I tear everything apart, and I am sure they want a spectacle. How shall I make my entrance. I put my finger to my mouth and ponder. It didn't take long. I always loved Godzilla movies when I was the same size as these tiny creatures which are such fun to crush and in the first movie he came ashore through the docks. Here I am, the sea, a reasonable depth, and I can do underwater swimming, the docks over there.....heehee, brilliant, even though I say it myself.

I wade out to sea to give myself a run in, and they will no doubt be thinking I'm going and they will breath a sigh of relief, but just wait.....Having gone what must have a few miles out to sea to them I turned towards the city, took a deep breath, and went underwater. It didn't take long to get back to the city swimming underwater so I didn't have to hold my breath for long. If the Godzilla movies are anything to go by, my progress would have been marked by increased waves and maybe some small boats capsizing but nothing serious enough to spoil the suspense and surprise.

Now was my surprise, suddenly surfacing from the water, cascades of the stuff coming off my body, it must have been a sight to them to see me there smiling, hands on hips. Then even more so as I walked towards the shore and the docks, I watched smaller boats sink as I waded, they always seem to do that, also the ending of more lives without me having to lift a finger. Then I climbed on to some larger ships as a step up to the shore, careful not to lose my balance as they moved.

Oooo that first crunch as my foot slammed onto some warehouses, squashing them flat, that was ecstasy. Onto dry ground, or now wet as the destruction at my footsteps was accompanied by fountains of water dripping off my body and drowning those who escaped the destruction. As I flattened the dock installations and knocked over the cranes I delighted in watching the panicking hordes. Thinking they were safe when I went out to sea they had had less time to think about escaping, which was fine by me, destroying a city which was living normally just moments before is just so much more interesting tan something half empty with people taking measures to save themselves. Several bloody squishy crunches followed as I tackled the crowds before starting on the front ranks of buildings next to the docks........
1221212.title: Get into the city from the docks

12212121.content:
You know, demolishing buildings is so much fun, others should try it, except of course I'm the only one bid enough. Pushing over and smashing the skyscrapers near the docks was such a blast, I got really turned on by the full on nature of my assault, so I just continued. I suspect 1000s of tinies died during this, but that's just too bad. They help make destruction so much more realistic, otherwise I might as well just step on cardboard boxes to fit them in the dustbin/garbage can. Anyway the destruction made me horny that I found myself rubbing between my legs and actually getting quite moist, well a girl must cater for her needs as the wimp Tim is not available, or even when he is, I joked to myself.

Anyway enough of this, I set myself a target, just for fun, to go over the million, I don't know how I'm going to count though, red blotches tend to mix together. I suppose I won't know until the news networks tell me, or Tim.........I'm so fed up with his whining, why doesn't he just live the life? First step in this is a few more steps, there are queues of crunchy cars trying to escape, with tinies in them, I count on my fingers, say 4 per car and......anyway no time to lose as I stretch my foot forward and step on the back of the queues of cars, mmmm, exquisite, the tickling of the cool metal, the soft squishing of their occupants. I can't help but topple more structures into the mix, I'm that kind of girl, a rich mixture of textures with concrete and glass there too. I took my time savouring every step, but it was over too quickly. I really need to be more assertive and order more people to join the queues...........

Then, heaven........I spied a stadium, and it was large and could fit so any people in, walking over to it, carelessly destroying structures and squishing people in my path, well if they must be in my way, and looking at it..........
